item.description: If a patient doesn’t respond well to GLP-1s, there are other things to try. But ultimately, the medications just might not work for them. Medscape Med...

item.title: CDC Cuts Recommended Childhood Vaccines to 11
item.description: Recommendations remain in place for all children for MMR, polio, chickenpox, and HPV vaccines, among others. Medscape Medical News
